data.title: Animal Crossing: Wild World
data.meta_description: Live a peaceful life in the new town! Interact with your neighbors and pay of your house loan in Animal Crossing: Wild World!
data.text:
Live a peaceful life in the new town! Interact with your neighbors and pay of your house loan in Animal Crossing: Wild World! Capture all kinds of fishes, catch all kinds of bugs, and collect all kinds of fossils to expand the town’s museum!

Animal Crossing: Wild World is a simulation video game for the Nintendo DS handheld gaming console. In this game, you will play as a new citizen in a far away town and your goal is to make the town prosperous and pay off your house loan that was forcefully given to you. Interact with the neighbors to make them happy and friendly to you. Design your own shirt, arrange your house, and create a flower garden – anything is possible in this fun simulation game.

There have been 74 likes from 96 votes on this game.
